text:
Second payment (180 days from now) is equivalent to a long position in an FRA
with contract rate F that settles in 180 days and pays S, - F2
Third payment (270 days from now) is equivalent to a long position in an FRA with
contract rate F that settles in 270 days and pays S3 - F3.
Fourth payment (360 days from now) is equivalent to a long position in an FRA
with contract rate F that settles in 360 days and pays S4 - F4.
